description: ProviderConfiguration stores the provided configuration for an encryption provider.

aescbc.description: aescbc is the configuration for the AES-CBC transformer.

aesgcm.description: aesgcm is the configuration for the AES-GCM transformer.

identity.description: identity is the (empty) configuration for the identity transformer.

kms.description: kms contains the name, cache size and path to configuration file for a KMS based envelope transformer.

secretbox.description: secretbox is the configuration for the Secretbox based transformer.
